SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class MembershipService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.MembershipService
@Path("/memberships") public class MembershipService extends Object
MembershipService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for managing project memberships, including adding, removing, and retrieving members.

  • Method Details

    • askToJoinProject

      @POST @Path("/ask/join/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void askToJoinProject(@PathParam("projectId") long projectId, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, DuplicatedAttributeException, UnknownHostException, ElementAssociationException
      Allows a user to request to join a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project to join.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project is not found.
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the user has already requested to join the project.
      UnknownHostException - if there is a network error.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an issue with the user's association to the project.

    • confirmAskToJoinProjectInvite

      @PUT @Path("/confirm/project") @Consumes("application/json") public void confirmAskToJoinProjectInvite(@QueryParam("token") String token, @QueryParam("approve") boolean approve, @QueryParam("approver") String approverUsername) throws EntityNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, UnauthorizedAccessException, UnknownHostException
      Confirms a user's request to join a project.
      Parameters:
      token - the token for the request.
      approve - whether to approve the request.
      approverUsername - the username of the approver.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.
      UnauthorizedAccessException - if the approver is not authorized.
      UnknownHostException - if there is a network error.

    • addUserToProject

      @POST @Path("/add/{username}/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void addUserToProject(@PathParam("username") String username, @PathParam("projectId") long projectId, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, UnknownHostException, ElementAssociationException
      Adds a user to a project.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to add.
      projectId - the ID of the project.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found.
      UnknownHostException - if there is a network error.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an issue with the user's association to the project.

    • acceptProjectInvite

      @PUT @Path("/accept/project") @Consumes("application/json") public void acceptProjectInvite(@QueryParam("token") String token, @QueryParam("approve") boolean approve) throws EntityNotFoundException, UnknownHostException
      Accepts or rejects a project invitation.
      Parameters:
      token - the token for the invitation.
      approve - whether to approve the invitation.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found.
      UnknownHostException - if there is a network error.

    • removeUserFromProject

      @DELETE @Path("/remove/{username}/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void removeUserFromProject(@PathParam("username") String username, @PathParam("projectId") long projectId, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws EntityNotFoundException, UnknownHostException, ForbiddenAccessException
      Removes a user from a project.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to remove.
      projectId - the ID of the project.
      securityContext - the security context.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or user is not found.
      UnknownHostException - if there is a network error.
      ForbiddenAccessException - if the user does not have permission to remove the user.

    • getProjectIdsByUserId

      @GET @Path("/projectIds/byUserId/{userId}") @Produces("application/json") public List<ProjectNameIdDto> getProjectIdsByUserId(@PathParam("userId") long userId)
      Retrieves a list of project IDs for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectNameIdDto representing the user's projects.

    • getBasicInfoByFirstLetter

      @GET @Path("/first/letter/{projectId}") @Produces("application/json") public List<UserBasicInfoDto> getBasicInfoByFirstLetter(@QueryParam("value") String firstLetter, @PathParam("projectId") long projectId)
      Retrieves a list of users' basic information by the first letter of their username for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - the first letter of the username.
      projectId - the ID of the project.
      Returns:
      a list of UserBasicInfoDto representing the users.
